General.Name: Capelli SA
General.Description: Capelli SA operates as a real estate development company in France, Switzerland, Luxembourg, and internationally. The company focuses on the development of living spaces, apartments, houses, duplex villas, and offices. It serves institutional investors, social landlords, individual investors, and buyers of main residences. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Capelli SA operates as a subsidiary of JCC Participations.
General.Address: 43 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Champagne-au-Mont-d'Or, France, 75008
